content.html: It is very indicative of the team when more slack discussions happen in DMs than public channels. It is more indicative of the culture when a leader responds to a question you posted in a channel with a DM and ends up leading it to a decision/closure in DMs.
content.value: It is very indicative of the team when more slack discussions happen in DMs than public channels.  It is more indicative of the culture when a leader responds to a question you posted in a channel with a DM and ends up leading it to a decision/closure in DMs.
